message: This is a fair division considering the value of the money.

Alice, given that each additional round reduces my share's value by 20%, I'm compelled to propose a deal that minimizes delay. I understand that if you wait, you might secure nearly the full 1000000. To reach a timely agreement and avoid further losses on my end, I'm offering you almost everything while keeping a minimal share for me. I hope you see the advantage of concluding the game now.
